name: UNchessTOMIZER
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/unchesstomizer
For this LD we took a 100% strategy game (chess), and shoved a bunch of randomness into it.

Each turn you get five cards.
Cards can give you a move modifier, range boost, special action, and finally the actual move.
You can use all five cards in your turn, for up to 5 moves.

Game modes possible: 
 player vs player
 player vs "highly trained set of neural networks" (aka a chain of nested if-s)
 AI vs AI - nice to watch

Technical stuff:
 Engine used: Godot 3
 2D Assets from: made in either Krita or screenshots from OneNote (yes really)
 3D Assets from: made in Blender or CC0 from the vastness of the interwebs
 Music from: made in LMMS

Team:

 kristoverek - Programming (chess), 3D art
 dusakus - Programming (not chess), 2D """"art""""
 devilmaydie - music
